mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (member_id, type_id, title, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{typeId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_id AS inquiryId, member_id AS memberId, type_id AS typeId, title, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM inquiry ORDER BY inquiry_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
